name: Another 2D Platforming Game
description: This Game is changing between a classic Zelda Like Top Down expierence and a 2D Jump and Run mode. This Game was made for the BrackeysGameJam2022.1 by Konrad "Zerschnetzloar" Moritz and Marc "Sinus" Scheibner. Use WASD to move and your mouse to aim.  When in Jump in Run mode you can use SPACE to jump. After each wave you can select a Perk including a Buff and a Debuff for the upcoming waves.
